Activity group filter expanded and contains the categories with subcategories, also CLEAR button placed on the left bottom of the expanded table, and OK button on the right bottom of the expanded table, each category also contains a Checkbox which by clicking automatically select/deselect options from the category.

Call → 

* BD Call
* Candidate Call
* Client Call

* Planned Client Call

Meeting → 

* Candidate IV
* Client Meeting

CV To client → 

* CV Sent

* Video Profile (APAC)

Email →

* Candidate Registration Pack

* Job Spec Sent
* Key Information Document Sent
* Mailshot
* Proposal Submitted
* Spec CV

Job Stage → 

* Additional Round

* Offer

* Round 1
* Round 2
* Shortlist

Billing → 

* Amending - Temporary Contract
* Backout

* Non-Placement Fee

* Termination - Temporary Contract

Other → 

* Assessment / Test / Training

Advert management → 

* Green flagged
* Job advert posted

Action: Filter by only one activity type using the checkbox.
Expected Result:
The table shows only entries matching the selected activity.
If there are no entries for the selected activity, a message is displayed:

*_No activity_*

*_Click ‘+’ to create a new activity log entry_*

Action: Select multiple activity types using the checkboxes.
Expected Result:
The table displays entries that match any of the selected activities.
If none of the selected activities have results, show:
*_No activity_*

*_Click ‘+’ to create a new activity log entry_*

Action: Select a full category (e.g., by clicking the category label or Select All checkboxes for that group).
Expected Result:
The table shows all entries belonging to any activity type under the selected category.
If there are no entries, show:
*_No activity_*

*_Click ‘+’ to create a new activity log entry_*

Action: Select two or more full categories (e.g., by clicking multiple category labels or Select All for each group).
Expected Result:
The table displays entries matching *any activity type* under the selected categories.
If no results are found, show:

*_No activity_*

*_Click ‘+’ to create a new activity log entry_*
